page.title: Victor Rodas' Portfolio - Developer and Web Programmer
page.description: Check out Victor Rodas' projects. Web Developer. Specialized in building applications with amazing user experiences.

subtitle.description: I'm a Front-End Developer from Paraguay, specialized in web and mobile development, passionate about creating awesome applications.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.description: Responsible for creating utilities and components for web application development. Significant improvement in user experience and performance of web applications.

experiences.title: Systems Analyst, Front-End Developer
experiences.description: Responsible for project planning. Identification of problems related to cron-jobs in a high-demand system in Spain.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.description: Main developer and user interface designer. Successful integration of the system with real-time dynamic data visualization from different devices.

explora-neembucu.name: Explora Ñeembucú – Discover the charms of Ñeembucú, Paraguay
explora-neembucu.description: A website developed with Astro and React that gathers information about hotels, restaurants, and relevant tourist spots in different areas of Ñeembucú. A unique tourism guide.

just-music.name: just-music – A beautiful command line interface
just-music.description: A command line interface that allows you to play music from YouTube without the need for a browser.

info-shop.name: InfoShop - FullStack Ecommerce
info-shop.description: Developed with React and Hono. This application keeps you up to date with the latest computer and electronics products. The catalog is automatically updated weekly.
